title: Cool Down in Your New Home W/ Central AC!☺
posting_body: ['1 BD | 1 BA | 772 SQFT', 'Monte Vista Apartment Homes offers the utmost in Southern California living with 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments in La Verne.', 'You will enjoy the renovated, redesigned interiors and life-enhancing upgrades around the property.', 'Wood-style flooring, spacious floor plans, and expansive private balconies are just a few features you’ll love about your new home.', 'An updated state-of-the-art fitness center, two gorgeous resort-style pools, and grilling stations and will make the larger community a hard place to leave.', 'When you do wander out into the world, you’re down the road historic Route 66 in La Verne, less than 30 miles from Los Angeles, and just minutes away from nearby Pomona.', 'Discover the upgrade you have been looking for at Monte Vista Apartment Homes in La Verne!', 'Go look at our photo gallery and schedule your appointment, or drop by and visit us for your personal tour today!', 'Apartment Features:', 'Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat-Gas range stove-Polished quartz kitchen countertops-In-home washer and dryer-Private patio/balcony-Appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher', 'Community Features:', 'Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating-Close to Shopping-Close to Airport-On-Site Maintenance-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area-Dishwasher-Tile Backsplash-Close to Public Transportation-Flexible Lease Terms Available-Controlled Access', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
